column4: why removing totem player will remove ubuntu-desktop too ? its this ok ?
it is ok, ubuntu-desktop is just a meta package
thanks
whats this evolution package for ? its really required ?
I think parts of gnome depend on it, not sure.  It's a mail client
you can try and see how much stuff it will take with it
it will also remove evolution-plugins and evolution-exchange
/ignore them?
well they still can ping the server :)
so thats not a good option ...
oh, thought you meant on irc
yeah on irc too
block their ip with a firewall then?
well let`s say im not at home .. its there not a way to drop anything coming from the same ip more then 3 time`s ping or whatever in 2 min ?
like if you ping me more then 3 times in 2 min then iptables will deog any other pings from you
yeah, I've seen something like that, I can't remember what it is called.  Someone else here probably knows
I think ubuntuforums.org was where I saw it so you may want to try searching while you wait around here for an answer
firestarter shows me a big list with hostnames , looks like people tryed to get into the smtp and http server , which doesnt even run :)
they tryed , port 25 and 80 bassic...
you can use k3b, or gnomebaker.  But k3b is better
just use gnomebaker then and see if it does what you need it to.  If you find it's lacking, then install k3b
well can this gnomebaker burn all the files as k3b ?
